programme.title: Episode 2

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Death of a Hero
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E04, A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo. A closer look at the crime scene reveals Bennie was dead before the fire, bumping an arson case up to homicide.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Killer On The Strip/The Doll Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E11, In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

MST3K: Escape 2000, 19960302000000 +0000, A grunge punk fights an evil corporation enforcing an evacuation of the Bronx in Escape from the Bronx (1983). Mike and the Bots have "Men's Night" on the SOL and Dr. Forester tries to come up with a way to boost the show's ratings.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

programme.title: The Slime People
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Slime People, S01E09, The crew puts Commando Cody on trial for crimes against reality after watching the sixth episode of Radar Men while slime monsters invade Los Angeles in The Slime People.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

MST3K: Women Of The Prehistoric Planet, 19900220000000 +0000, Our intrepid hosts are trapped between Isaac Asimov's Literary Doomsday Device and Robert Ito from Quincy M.E. (1976) in a fur caveman outfit.
MST3K: Track Of The Moon Beast, 19990613000000 +0000, In Track of the Moon Beast (1976), a mineralogist is hit by a meteor which causes him to transform into a lizard-monster.

programme.title: Backlot: The History Of MST3K, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E49, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.
MST3K: Munchie, 20220527000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch as a child befriends MUNCHIE (1992). Jonah refuses to go back into the theater and suffers the consequences.
MST3K: The Dead Talk Back, 19940730000000 +0000, Metaphysics helps to solve a murder case while Mike and the Bots impersonate the Grateful Dead.
MST3K: The Undead, 19970308000000 +0000, A woman gets hypnotized back into her Dark Age'd past life while Tom takes a crack at being an observer.

The Mystery Cruise, 20131005000000 +0000, Alvirah, Regan, and their husbands join a murder mystery cruise. But, when Alvirah sees a real murder attempt, she and Regan must find a way to keep the intended victim safe while trying to find proof to expose the murderer.

programme.title: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: The Trouble with Love
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie feels upset after Grace admits she's been spending more time with Sam.

programme.title: Surprise Me
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie is surprised with adventurous outings by both Sam and John.

programme.title: Risk
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. After a great date with Sam, Cassie feels spellbound by their connection.

programme.title: What's Your Secret?
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie begins to conjure up a surprise party for Martha and Tom.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie works her magic to help Sam make a tough decision.

programme.title: Change of Heart
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E09, Hallmark Original Series. A determined Jack properly asks Elizabeth for a dinner date.

programme.title: Love Comes First
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E10, Hallmark Original Series. Saying goodbye to Jack has left Elizabeth heartbroken.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E11, Hallmark Original Series. Jack is hailed a hero after putting away the Tolliver outlaws.

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E12, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail is beginning to let go of her grief and look toward the future.

The Love Letter (Crown Media), 19980201000000 +0000, Romantic fantasy unfolds when a young man finds a hundred year old letter in an empty desk. Stars Campbell Scott and Jennifer Jason Leigh. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

The Magic of Ordinary Days, 20050130000000 +0000, Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

programme.title: Ripple Effect
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E13, Stargate Command is baffled by the arrival of several virtually identical SG-1 teams and must find a way to return them to their respective universes before calamity occurs. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stronghold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E14, Daniel fears the worst when Teal'c mysteriously disappears after investigating corruption. His fears are confirmed when he finds that Jaffa have been kidnapped and brainwashed. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Ethon
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E15, SG-1 sets out to destroy a massive and deadly weapon invented by their increasingly powerful foe, the Ori. If not, the Caledonian Federation and its people will be destroyed. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E16, Hank Landry (Beau Bridges) and the rest of the Stargate team plan an offensive when they learn that the Goa'uld Ba'al is in the United States and is once again regaining power. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Scourge
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E17, A crop of genetically engineered insects turns deadly, forcing the SG-1 team to destroy them before they and the visiting international diplomats becoming their next victims. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Arthur's Mantle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E18, While Teal'c sets off to investigate foul play on a Jaffa planet, Mitchell, Carter and Daniel become out of phase while experimenting with a powerful and ancient device. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Crusade
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E19, Vala returns to Stargate Command to deliver startling news: the Ori have been building military forces, and plan to launch crusades against their dissidents in the near future. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Camelot
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E20, As the Ori's all out assault. looms closer, lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell and Daniel Jackson race to locate a device that will obliterate the evil enemy once and for all. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Flesh And Blood
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E01, As their battle with the Ori continues, the team struggles to reunite and formulate a plan to defeat their enemy. Vala (Claudia Black), still aboard an Ori ship, watches as her newly born child quickly ages and is molded to lead the Ori army.

programme.title: Morpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E02, On a mission to find a weapon that will defeat their powerful foe, the team finds a planet whose inhabitants were killed by a mysterious illness, and unwittingly fall victim to the illness themselves. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E05, After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: First Contact
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E10, Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E005, When Brandon tries out for the basketball team, he's angered to learn that his main rival is from another district.

programme.title: Higher Education
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E006, An unreasonable teacher makes Brandon's life miserable by giving him no grade higher than a C.

programme.title: Perfect Mom
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E007, "Delusions of glamour" overcome Brenda when she meets Kelly's beautiful mother Jackie, a former model.

programme.title: Seventeen Year Itch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E008, The Walsh parents examine their relationship while Brenda and Brandon examine theirs, as they get involved in a UCLA study on twins.

programme.title: The Gentle Art Of Listening
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E009, Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.

programme.title: Isn't It Romantic?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E010, The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: B.Y.O.B.
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E011, Both Walsh twins face the temptation to drink alcohol when their peers are doing it all around them.

programme.title: One Man and a Baby
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E012, Brandon gets an unexpected taste of fatherhood when he asks his classmate Melissa for a date-then has to baby-sit her infant son while she has a college interview.

programme.title: Slumber Party

programme.title: East Side Story

programme.title: Palm Springs Weekend
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E015, A weekend in Palm Springs goes awry when David invites Steve, Kelly and Donna to join him at his grandparents' house while they're away on a cruise-but he gets the dates confused, and they're still there.

programme.title: Fame Is Where You Find It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E016, Brandon is "discovered" when he's out roller-blading, landing a role as an emergency extra on a big TV show.

programme.title: Stand (Up) and Deliver
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E017, Brenda's had it with home life and West Beverly and decides to leave both for the real world.

programme.title: It's Only a Test
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E018, The Walsh twins and all their friends are panicked by the upcoming SATs, but then everything gets put in perspective when Brenda finds a lump in her breast and faces a test no one can prepare for.

programme.title: April Is the Cruelest Month
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E019, Brandon interviews a classmate, Roger, who's an outstanding athlete and student--and haunted by the overbearing success of his father.

programme.title: Spring Training
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E020, Baseball fever strikes when Brandon is asked to coach a little league team after his dad gets injured.

programme.title: Circling Boat/Where’s My Wife?
